Ask a question, spark a conversation, tell a story. Be honest, fearless and show who you are in the emails you write. You'll reap great relationships from it.

Trim your tree with candy canes or gingerbread men and give one away when someone looks they could use a bit of holiday cheer.

Do you sing O Tannenbaum in German at home? Have a killer recipe for Panettone? Write out the words to a traditional carol or your grandmother’s recipe and share it with your friend, colleague or customer.

Feel free to add additional image and text sections to make the template a reflection of who you are and the story you want to share. Keep in mind that your email should be fairly short (average time spent reading an email is 15 seconds) and actionable.
Text call to actions, such as the "Read More" below, are a great way to encourage people to visit your landing page.
